description: Define a tool / function call for a LLM to use.

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: Optional override for the name of the tool, visible to the LLM and typically alphanumeric without spaces.

inputs.name: description
inputs.description: Optional override for a short description of the tool, visible to the LLM.

inputs.name: parameters
inputs.description: Optional override for the JSON Schema of the parameters for the tool.

settings.name: name
settings.description: The name of the tool, visible to the LLM and typically alphanumeric without spaces.

settings.name: description
settings.description: A short description of the tool, visible to the LLM.

settings.name: parameters
settings.description: The JSON Schema of the parameters for the tool, which the LLM will match when it calls the tool.
